info.title: Transaction Details
info.description: API to retrieve information on transactions and accounting entries.

get.summary: Retrieves transaction details for a specific accounting entry
get.description: Retrieves the details of a transaction for a specific accounting entry reference that includes debit and credit party details , amount , date , payment reference , charges and cheque details.

parameters.name: entryReference
parameters.description: It is the transaction reference. This is the identifier of the transaction on Temenos Core Banking system

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves accounting entries for a specific transaction reference
get.description: Retrieves the details of accounting entries for a specific transaction that includes entry reference , account number , name , transaction code , date , amount , currency and narrative.

parameters.name: transactionReference
parameters.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction in the core system

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Retrieves the details of account transaction
get.description: Retrieves transaction details for the specified account that includes entry reference , account number , name , transaction code , date , amount , currency , narrative , cheque numbers and balance.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: listType
parameters.description: Indicates the transaction search type

parameters.name: transactionCount
parameters.description: Indicates the total number of transactions

parameters.name: payType
parameters.description: Indicates the identifier of payment types for  letter of credit

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: Start date of the loan

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: End date of the loan

parameters.name: minimumAmount
parameters.description: The minimum account balance required

parameters.name: maximumAmount
parameters.description: The maximum account balance allowed

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

parameters.name: transactionCode
parameters.description: Identifies the system internal transaction code applicable to the transaction

parameters.name: entryReference
parameters.description: It is the transaction reference. This is the identifier of the transaction on Temenos Core Banking system

parameters.name: chequeNumber
parameters.description: Cheque number associated with the transaction or accounting entry

parameters.name: chequeNumberRange
parameters.description: Indicates the criteria for the range operation search on cheque numbers

parameters.name: skipImageDetails
parameters.description: Indicates to skip retrieval of image specific details for a statement reference. Accept Values YES, NO or NULL

parameters.name: statementSortMethod
parameters.description: Indicates the method in which the statement entries are to be sorted. Possible values oldest/latest. Oldest - displays the entries in ascending timestamp order. Latest - displays the entries in descending timestamp order

parameters.name: statementPageSize
parameters.description: Contains the total number of statement to be returned per page

parameters.name: statementPageNumber
parameters.description: Contains the record from which the statement must be displayed

parameters.name: entryReferenceFrom
parameters.description: Indicates the entry from which the transaction history needs to be retrieved. If an end date is not specified, transactions from delta list till 'today' are retrieved

parameters.name: suppressMaskEntries
parameters.description: Indicator to skip retrieval of masked entry details. Example, reversal entries of a transaction. Allowed values are Yes or Y

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

get.summary: Calculates applicable taxes for the transaction.
get.description: Calculates the applicable tax amount and tax distribution based on the transaction amount, currency, tax type or tax code or tax rate and distribution method provided. System uses the given tax rate as primary rate or can use tax type or code to derive the applicable tax rates. While using tax type, customer key is also required to fetch the tax code and its rates applicable for the specific customer. When distribution indicator is NET, the system calculates the tax amount and NET distribution which excludes the tax amount, whereas if distribution indicator is GROSS, the system calculates the tax amount and GROSS distribution which includes the tax amount. When multiple details are given, priority order is as follows - tax rate > tax code > tax type.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Identifier of the customer

parameters.name: taxDistributionIndicator
parameters.description: Indicates the distribution method used to calculate applicable taxes for the transaction. Possible values are NET and GROSS

parameters.name: taxType
parameters.description: Indicates the tax identification type for the customer, ex-SSN, TIN, FTIN etc

parameters.name: taxCode
parameters.description: Represents a reference on the TAX table which will indicate the rate to be used for computation of taxation for the associated property

parameters.name: taxRate
parameters.description: Indicates the tax rate to be applied on a transaction

parameters.name: taxAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the tax applicable for the transaction for a tax type

parameters.name: transactionAmount
parameters.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

parameters.name: transactionCurrency
parameters.description: Indicates the currency of the transaction. For example GBP, USD etc

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

totalTax.description: Indicates the total amount of taxes applicable for the transaction

transactionCurrency.description: Indicates the currency of the transaction. For example GBP, USD etc

taxDetails.description: Specifies details about taxes for a party

taxType.description: Indicates the tax identification type for the customer, ex-SSN, TIN, FTIN etc.

taxCode.description: Represents a reference on the TAX table which will indicate the rate to be used for computation of taxation for the associated property

taxRate.description: Indicates the tax rate to be applied on a transaction.

taxAmount.description: Indicates the tax applicable for the transaction for a tax type.

transactionAmount.description: Contains the transaction amount. This is based on the currency, either local or foreign currency

stockExchange.description: Contains the stock exchange details where a particular security is usually dealt

notes.description: Notes to facilitate the use of the function

imageId.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified

transactionReference.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction in the core system

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

chequeNumber.description: Cheque number associated with the transaction or accounting entry

ISIN.description: The international securities identification number of the instrument

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

companyId.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

balance.description: The monetary value of each balance type for an account is itemised

bookingDate.description: Indicates the date on which this business activity is booked in the underlying system. The effective date and booking date could be different if systems allow forward/back dated business transactions. Dates are expected in YYYYMMDD format. If booking date is not passed, effective date would be assumed as booking date

documentId.description: Based on documentCode, the field defaults the required document codes

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency

shortName.description: Contains the name of the account, basically the short title of the account

entryReference.description: It is the transaction reference. This is the identifier of the transaction on Temenos Core Banking system

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from Transact on every enquiry request

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual Transact error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by Transact

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

localCurrencyId.description: The ISO code (3 letters) for the institution's local currency

debitCurrencyId.description: The currency of the debit side in payment transaction.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: Date on which the amount will be debited for settlement

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitAccountIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the debtor account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

transactionReference.description: Contains the identifier for the transaction in the core system

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

processingDate.description: The date when payment instruction is processed in system

clearingDate.description: Contains the date from which the payment is expected and is used to indicate the exposure date for the payment

chargeType.description: Indicates the charge types which are applicable for the transaction. Example: CORRBKCHG

bankName.description: The name of the bank being referred to

valueDate.description: Indicates the value date on which the underlying accounting entry is to be given value (for interest purposes)

chequeNumber.description: Cheque number associated with the transaction or accounting entry

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

dateOfOriginalAuthorisation.description: This is a system populated field to display the date on which MT740 (Authorization to Reimburse) was sent

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

creditValueDate.description: Reference quoted by the credit account for a payment

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditAccountIBAN.description: Indicates the IBAN of the credit account

customerRate.description: The exchange rate that is actually applied for currency conversion in case of transactions involving FX conversion.

bookingDate.description: Indicates the date on which this business activity is booked in the underlying system. The effective date and booking date could be different if systems allow forward/back dated business transactions. Dates are expected in YYYYMMDD format. If booking date is not passed, effective date would be assumed as booking date

chargeAmount.description: Retrieves the charge amount after redeem

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency

beneficiaries.description: Identifies the Beneficiary name and address of the Standing Order

beneficiaryIBAN.description: International Bank Account Number (IBAN) of the beneficiary account, required only for International transfers/payments outside the Bank. For example: GB98 MIDL07009312345678, FR7630006000011234567890189

beneficiaryAccountId.description: Unique account identifier of the beneficiary account number.

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.

entryReference.description: It is the transaction reference. This is the identifier of the transaction on Temenos Core Banking system

accountId.description: Identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId. Accepts both IBAN & BBAN

documentId.description: Based on documentCode, the field defaults the required document codes

imageId.description: A system generated unique identifier for the image record

imageType.description: Indicates the internal classification of images - such as Photographs, Documents, Passports, etc..,

companyId.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001

notes.description: Notes to facilitate the use of the function

accountName.description: Display name or short name of the account specified

narrative.description: The additional text printed on descriptive statements in addition to the standard narrative and/or reference

bookingDate.description: Indicates the date on which this business activity is booked in the underlying system. The effective date and booking date could be different if systems allow forward/back dated business transactions. Dates are expected in YYYYMMDD format. If booking date is not passed, effective date would be assumed as booking date

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency

entryReference.description: It is the transaction reference. This is the identifier of the transaction on Temenos Core Banking system

transactionId.description: Unique transaction identifier for retrieving the details of the transaction. For example: FT0102030333 etc
